title: Executive / Sr.  Executive - Chemical Purchase
tagsAndSkills: Vendor Development,Chemical Purchase,Chemical Procurement,sourcing of material,Procurement,Negotiation,SAP,lab chemicals

ambitionBoxData.Title: Privi Speciality Chemicals Reviews by Employees

jobDescription:
Candidate who can source new vendors and do the negotiation of chemical Raw Material purchase only please apply.


Purpose of this role : To ensure effective planning and execution of procurement objectives for all chemical raw materials in line with the business objectives. This position is responsible for managing the procurement of chemical raw materials required for our organization's manufacturing processes. It involves identifying suitable suppliers, negotiating contracts, ensuring timely deliveries, and maintaining efficient inventory levels to support production needs.


Roles and Responsibilities


Supplier Identification and Management:

  • Research and identify potential suppliers of chemicals (Organic chemicals, Solvants, R&D Lab chemicals, Speciality chemicals)
  • Evaluate suppliers' capabilities, pricing, and reliability.
  • Maintain and update a supplier database.

Negotiation and Contract Management:

  • Negotiate pricing, terms, and conditions with suppliers.
  • Create and manage procurement contracts.
  • Ensure compliance with contract terms.

Market Research:

  • Stay updated on market trends, pricing, and availability of raw materials.
  • Provide market insights and recommendations to management.

Compliance and Documentation:

  • Ensure compliance with all relevant laws and regulations.
  • Maintain accurate procurement records and documentation.
  • Prepare reports on procurement activities as required.
  • Planning and procurement of material in line with the Business plan.
  • Responsible for purchase of assigned raw materials and daily PR/PO fulfilment process. Conversion of Purchase Requisition to Purchase Order in SAP system for raw material & packing material taking into consideration supply chain constraints.
  • Quote analysis before finalizing order by keeping proper inventory control.
  • Update import shipment schedule weekly to the concerned department.
  • Single point of contact for suppliers to resolve issues pertaining to quality, delivery, invoices and any other order related issues to facilitate on time order delivery.
  • Coordinate and follow up with finance for L/c, DA payment and original docs from Bank and also updating the LC Application system.
  • Work with vendors/suppliers/Freight forwarder to follow up on delivery dates and shipment document for the same.
  • Follow up with Liaisoning Department for MEIS, Advance License for duty free clearance, wherever applicable.
  • Coordination and follow up with CHA and transporter for timely clearance from port to factory by providing on time documents required for clearance.
  • Updating the import shipments in SAP.
  • Knowledge of Pre and Post shipping documents is must.
  • Forwarding CHA & transport Invoices after checking them to Accounts department for on time processing.
  • Preparing Insurance for FCA, CFR and for Empty Tank container.
  • Preparing MIS report monthly and other reports as per requirement.
  • Maintaining and Keeping records of shipment in system and hard Copy.
  • Vendor development for new products.
  • Track the status of pending orders and inform concerned person in case of any issues.
  • Vendor development & Vendor Evaluation.


Desired Candidate Profile

  1. Proven experience in chemcial raw material procurement or supply chain management.
  2. Must have good knowledge of Import documentation and process.
  3. Strong negotiation and contract management skills.
  4. Knowledge of procurement software and tools.
  5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  6. Analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  7. Ability to work in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
  8. Familiarity with Incoterms and international shipping terms
  9. Written and verbal communication in (English)
  10. Good Excel skills
  11. Basic knowledge of SAP.
